feed.title: Gravity Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.26.1
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.26.1

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.26.1

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.26.1

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.26.0...v0.26.1

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.26.4
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.26.4

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.26.4

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.26.4

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.26.3...v0.26.4

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.26.5
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.26.5

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.26.5

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.26.5

What's Changed

  • dhcp: delete leases of a scope when the scope is deleted by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1500
  • web: fix empty IP address causing sorting to fail by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1501
  • web: fix dns table chart with multiple nodes by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1502

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.26.4...v0.26.5

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.27.0
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.27.0

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.27.0

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.27.0

Upgrade external-dns to use this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity-external-dns:v0.27.0

What's Changed

  • Upgrade to etcd 3.6 which will decrease memory usage by up to 50%
  • build(deps): bump eslint from 9.20.0 to 9.20.1 in /web in the eslint group by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1503
  • web: replace dhcp usage chart as it was often broken by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1505
  • build(deps): bump library/golang from 1.23 to 1.24 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1509
  • build(deps): bump @codemirror/legacy-modes from 6.4.2 to 6.4.3 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1508

  • build(deps): bump @octokit/request-error from 5.1.0 to 5.1.1 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1512

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.27.1
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.27.1

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.27.1

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.27.1

Upgrade external-dns to use this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity-external-dns:v0.27.1

What's Changed

  • build(deps): bump eslint from 9.26.0 to 9.27.0 in /web in the eslint group by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1680
